# hpcr_json (Resource)

Generates a base64 encoded token from the JSON serialization of the input.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `json` (String, Sensitive) JSON Document to archive

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Resource identifier
- `rendered` (String) Rendered output of the resource
- `sha256_in` (String) SHA256 of the input
- `sha256_out` (String) SHA256 of the ouput
